title: 266. Q&AF: Right Path In Business, Providing Value To Great Companies & Customer Attention
itunes:title: 266. Q&AF: Right Path In Business, Providing Value To Great Companies & Customer Attention
description: In today's episode, Andy answers your questions about identifying if your company is heading in the right direction, ways an employee can add value to an already established company, and how much attention you should give to new customers versus current customers.
content:encoded: In today's episode, Andy answers your questions about identifying if your company is heading in the right direction, ways an employee can add value to an already established company, and how much attention you should give to new customers versus current customers.
